DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: MONTICELLI, M. A. C. G.;GONZALES, M. A.;GONZALES, M.A.C.;Gonzales, Maria Alice Camargo;Gonzales, Maria Alice

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH:
Arquiteta urbanista, graduada pela Faculdade de Arquitetura e Urbanismo da Universidade de So Paulo - FAU USP (1997). Mestra em Cincias pelo Programa de Mestrado Profissional em Inovao na Construo Civil, na Escola Politcnica da Universidade de So Paulo (2016). Doutoranda no programa de Design na FAU USP desde 2020. integrante da equipe da iniciativa IRIS USP, no Centro de Inovao da Universidade de So Paulo - InovaUSP. 

Participou como teacher assistant nos projetos da disciplina Global New Product Design Innovation (ME310) e Stanford University Global Alliance for Redesign (Sugar Network), participando da EXPE 2014 e EXPO 2016 na d.School, Stanford University. Foi monitora na disciplina Desenvolvimento Integrado de Produto, optativa do curso de Engenharia de Produo da Escola Politcnica da USP e do grupo de estudo sobre Educao em Engenharia PoliEdu e assistente da disciplina Co-design de aplicativos, no INSPER. Tem experincia na rea de Design e Arquitetura com nfase em co-design, design grfico e arquitetura e cenografia, atuando nos seguintes temas: prototipagem, atividades interativas imersivas em museus de cincias, layout para ambiente de pesquisa.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN:
Urban Architect, graduated from the School of Architecture and Urbanism of the University of So Paulo - FAU USP (1997). Master of Science by the Professional Master's Program in Innovation in Civil Construction, at the Polytechnic School of the University of So Paulo (2016). PhD candidate in the Design program at FAU USP since 2020. She is a member of the IRIS USP initiative team, at the Innovation Center of the University of So Paulo - InovaUSP. 

Participated as a teacher assistant in the Global New Product Design Innovation (ME310) and Stanford University Global Alliance for Redesign (Sugar Network) projects, participating in EXPE 2014 and EXPO 2016 at d.School, Stanford University. She was an instructor in the Integrated Product Development, an elective subject in the Production Engineering course at Escola Politcnica da USP and in the study group about Engineering Education PoliEdu She is teacher assistant of the subject Co-design of applications, at INSPER. She has experience in the area of Design and Architecture with emphasis in co-design, graphic design and architecture and set design, working on the following themes: prototyping, immersive interactive activities in science museums, layout for research environment.

OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES: Trabalhos realizados nas reas de design grfico, cenografia e arquitetura atuando na funo de direo de arte em projetos de cd-roms, eventos, curta-metragem para cinema, animaes e sites.
